Message.Text: Welcome to Mark's Unturned PvP Arena Server, we hope you enjoy your stay!
Please chat in English or any other Asian language. Also, be polite.
You're now playing on PVP server. Visit our Steam Group for more info!
If you have any questions, ask an admin on our Steam Group.
Did you know? You can PM the players with /pm (PlayerName) (Message)
Did you know? You can reply the players PM with /r (Message)
DYK? Anti-Suicide prevents players from relocating to new locations when suiciding.
DYK? You can view your statistics with /stats (pvp/pve) (PlayerName)
